Key Match Events: Stoinis showed his energy and hit the deck hard
Pre-Game Insights: Australia captain Pat Cummins faced some tough questions after losing his first two games at the World Cup.
Pakistan captain Babar Azam admitted shortcomings in defeat
Australia opener David Warner said his groin won't be a problem
Post-Match Reflections: Pat Cummins said it was a great win and that the openers set the tone
Babar Azam said they were not up to the mark and were not consistent in their line
David Warner said they had a good hit yesterday in the middle and felt like they were ticking along
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia moved level on points with Pakistan and South Africa
South Africa has only played three games
The Proteas have a game against England tomorrow
Australia has a break until Wednesday when they take on the Netherlands in Delhi
Pakistan takes on Bangladesh in Mumbai on Monday
